name: Honolulu Language Club
short_description:
Hawaii - best place to learn English while enjoying the tropical climate and oceanic surrounding.

Tom Marchant, has an advanced certificate in English Language Teaching for TEFL/ TESOL and offers great conversation classes in English. 

Rates are as follows:

$25 on private lessons and $200 per month for 1 hour on group lessons twice a week.

Afternoon and evening schedules are available from Mondays- Saturdays. To schedule for a tutorial you may call 808-781-9565 or send a message on this facebook page : https://www.facebook.com/groups/honolululanguageclub

Make the most of your Hawaiian adventure and book your class now!
summary: We are here to learn, practice, and speak the different languages .
